## EnumOrString type

A TypeScript utility type which creates a union of an enum member and its string representation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EnumOrString<T extends string> = T | `${T}`;
```

## Remarks

Allows interfaces to support both enums and strings.
